Thank you Barry,

I did not doubt the mei, it was being told that it was TA=
DASHIRO and 
not finding that name anywhere. I looked in the Haynes index (=
which I 
now proudly own) and found no such name. It is without a doubt 
TA=
DAHIRO.

I will send you pic's of another kogatana that has a mei. It looks=
 
very suspicious to me, and I have no idea what it says. I will post 
them=
 into my album and send you same directly. Maybe it will be 
legit, maybe n=
ot. Somebody at some time has tried to fake a hamon on 
this little blade. =
I need to remove this, any ideas? I don't want to 
spend any money on this =
blade unless the mei is real. Let me know 
your thoughts. It's a learning e=
xperience!

Thanks,

Elliott
